header.title: Your Legacy Protection Journey
header.description: Follow this personalized checklist to secure your family's future

setup-vault.title: Setup your secure vault
setup-vault.description: Create your encrypted document storage with client-side security.

upload-documents.title: Upload important documents
upload-documents.description: Add your essential documents like IDs, insurance, and legal papers.

add-guardians.title: Add trusted guardians
add-guardians.description: Invite family members or friends who can access your documents if needed.

set-permissions.title: Set guardian permissions
set-permissions.description: Define what each guardian can access and when they can access it.

emergency-contacts.title: Add emergency contacts
emergency-contacts.description: Set up emergency contact information for your guardians.

create-legacy.title: Create legacy messages
create-legacy.description: Record video messages and letters for your loved ones.

schedule-reviews.title: Schedule regular reviews
schedule-reviews.description: Set up reminders to keep your legacy plan updated.

will-creation.title: Create your will
will-creation.description: Draft your last will and testament with professional guidance.

beneficiary-setup.title: Set beneficiaries
beneficiary-setup.description: Designate who will inherit your assets and access your accounts.

medical-directives.title: Medical directives
medical-directives.description: Create advance healthcare directives and power of attorney documents.
